title: 50 Kg Of Sour Cherries In Canada

sources.title: 50 Kg Of Sour Cherries In Canada
sources.description: Synopsis When the corrupted groom starts shooting in the wedding ceremony, guests try to run away. Aida and Davoud accidentally end up in a car that crashes a police car. Aida lies to the inspector that Davoud is her husband and that's where the story begins. Cast: Farhad Aeesh, Mona Ahmadi, Siamak Ansari, Dariush Asadzade, Vishka Asayesh, Behnoosh Bakhtiari, Afsaneh Bayegan, Mehran Ghafoorian, Mani Haghighi, Pejman Jamshidi, Hasti Mahdavifar, Omid Roohani, Ali Sadeghi, Azadeh Samadi, Sorush Sehhat
